name: ByteFifoBuffer_consumeWriteBufferTest
description: Unit tests for the consumeWriteBuffer method of ByteFifoBuffer.

test_cases.name: testConsumeWriteBufferSuccess
test_cases.description: Tests the successful consumption of the write buffer without overflow.

test_cases.name: testConsumeWriteBufferOverflow
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of buffer overflow when consuming the write buffer.

test_cases.name: testConsumeWriteBufferNegativeCount
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of negative count when consuming the write buffer.

test_cases.name: testConsumeWriteBufferWithWrite
test_cases.description: Tests the consumption of the write buffer after writing data to it.

test_cases.name: testConsumeWriteBufferWithWriteAndOverflow
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of buffer overflow when consuming the write buffer after writing data to it.
